credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Study for a painting: The Ascension of the Virgin
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and gray wash, pen and ink, red crayon on paper
description: Angels are participating in the event.  Two hold a crown over the head of the Virgin.  Verso: "Marrello" is written in contemporary hand, in the lower left corner.
name: Drawing
